description: Redheaded fist dog Chris Ward has some friends in town and wants to show them a good time. Not wanting to get his house dirty with all the filthy action, he rents out a San Francisco sex club for some uninhibited action. RJ Parker is the first to offer to dig in, gagging on Mack Kurtis' impressive meat stick. After flipping Parker around on his thick pole, Kurtis pulls out and cums on Parker's leather boots.
title: Fist for Hire 2, Scene #02
